attachTo.description:
Element the Popover will attach to and point at. A `useRef` must be attached to an html element
and passed as an attachTo prop in order for the Popover to function properly
attachTo.name: attachTo

onRequestClose.description: Callback executed when the user wants to close/dismiss the Popover
onRequestClose.name: onRequestClose

preferredPlacement.description: Describes the preferred placement of the Popover.
preferredPlacement.name: preferredPlacement

UNSAFE_className.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom class names for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the Customizing components Guide.
UNSAFE_className.name: UNSAFE_className

type.name: { container?: string; dismissButtonContainer?: string; arrow?: string; }

UNSAFE_style.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom style for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_style.name: UNSAFE_style

type.name: { container?: CSSProperties; dismissButtonContainer?: CSSProperties; arrow?: CSSProperties; }
